title: Industrial Experience
description: Learning through direct involvement in real industrial environments, gaining practical exposure to tools, processes, and professional workflows.

title: Group Discussion (GD)
description: A collaborative learning method where participants discuss a topic to improve communication, critical thinking, and teamwork skills.

title: Group Study
description: Learning in small groups where students help each other understand concepts, share knowledge, and solve problems together.

title: Industrial Visit
description: Educational visits to industries to observe real-world applications of theoretical concepts and understand industrial operations.

title: Real-Life Experience
description: Learning gained from everyday life situations, personal challenges, and practical problem-solving outside formal education.
